title: Hogel Manor
blockb: Action: Spend 9 progress to raise Sunrider Disposition track by one.

title: Horsethief Meadows
blocka: Action: Add progress equal to Tactics on any card with a Military tag.

title: Arban the Swift
blockb: Action: Test Command 1. Success: Burn card. Failure: +1 Discord.
blockc: (FORCEFUL) +3 Discord. Defense: Command. If in staging area, move to occupied mission location.

title: Feast at Hogel Manor
blockc: Immediate: Spend 5 progress. Increase Sunrider Disposition track. Move to stage 1.

title: Song Bluff
blocka: Effect: All characters increase their Tactics by Sunrider Disposition while at least one character is at this location.

title: Uneasy Truce
blockc: Immediate: Spend 3 progress. One character at location gains +1 Tactics. Move to stage 2.

title: Ile
blockb: Action: Test Lore 1. Success: Burn card. Failure: +1 Discord.
blockc: (WEIRD) +3 Discord. Defense: Lore. If in staging area, move to occupied mission location.

title: Rumors of Smoke and Fire
blockc: Immediate: Spend 7 progress. Increase Sunrider Disposition track. Complete Mission Path.

title: Taichu
blockb: Action: Test Tactics 1. Success: Burn card. Failure: +1 Discord.
blockc: (QUICK) +3 Discord. Defense: Tactics. If in staging area, move to occupied mission location.

title: Hogel
blockb: Action: Test Rapport 1. Success: Burn card. Failure: +1 Discord.
blockc: (SNEAKY) +3 Discord. Defense: Rapport. If in staging area, move to occupied mission location.

title: Dashen
blockb: Action: Test Rapport 1. Success: Burn card. Failure: +1 Discord.
blockc: (GANG) +2 Discord. Defense: Rapport. If in staging area, move to occupied mission location.

title: Feast at Hogel Manor
blocka: Test: Command 1. Success: +1 Fortune. Failure: +2 Discord.

title: Imperial Strategies
blockb: Success: Place one progress on any Sunrider challenge or location. Failure: +2 Discord.

title: A Bitter Grudge
blockb: Effect: Play on angry character. Rapport tests are difficult for remainder of mission. Discard effect if angry condition is removed.

title: Shame To Anger
blockb: Result: A frustrated character in party gains the angry condition.

title: The Coming War
blockb: Success: Add two progress to any Sunriders location or attachment.

title: Welcome Party
blocka: Immediate: Gain Fortune equal to Diplomacy.
